Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ish::InputOption

different options to used to check input

Enumerator:
IsDown 

if key or button is down/used

IsUp 

if key or button is not used

IsPressed 

if key or button was pressed this frame

IsReleased 

if key or button was released this frame

enum ish::PlayerIndexs

Index of a player and a xbox controller.

Enumerator:
PlayerOne 
PlayerTwo 
PlayerThree 
PlayerFour 
PlayerMax 

Maximum number of players, do not use this for a parameter in a funtion

enum ish::SaveOption

Sifferent saving option for runtime configuration.

Enumerator:
NoSave 

do not save and only get input string

SaveOnly 

do save to a file but do not reload or add new input setting

SaveReload 

do save and reload input setting with given file

SaveAdd 

do save and add or replace new input option from the current settings
